Bayern Munich

Bayern Munich Team News

Picking up what was a long-term knee injury while away with Canada during March’s international break, Alphonso Davies is set to miss the remainder of the season. Storming his way to Germany’s Golden Boot this season and already notching 23 Bundesliga strikes, England skipper Harry Kane will lead the line here. Former Tottenham defender Eric Dier could keep his spot alongside Min-Jae Kim at the heart of Kompany’s defence.

Despite claiming a thumping 4-1 win away at Freiburg last weekend, BVB have struggled to find any kind of stability on the road. Making a cameo appearance off the bench in Catalonia, Niklas Sule could make a first start since the middle of February. Bagging 15 Bundesliga strikes this season, ex-Stuttgart striker Serhou Guirassy will lead the line in Munich.
